scripts.android:build: cd android && rm -R build && cd app && rm -R build && cd ../..
scripts.android:device: export PATH=~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools:$PATH && adb devices && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.android:env: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
scripts.android:cache: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew --stop && export PATH=~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools:$PATH && adb kill-server && cd ..
scripts.android:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/remove
scripts.remove:extra: cd android/app/src && rm -R remove && mkdir remove && cd .. && cd build/outputs/apk && rm -f app-release.apk && cd ../../../../../../..
scripts.assemble: npm run remove:extra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProdRelease && cd ..
scripts.assemble-dev: npm run remove:extra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevRelease && cd ..
scripts.debugAssemble: npm run remove:extra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProdDebug && cd ..
scripts.apk: npm run bundle && npm run assemble && npm run changeName-prod
scripts.apk-dev: npm run bundle && npm run assemble-dev &&  npm run changeName-dev
scripts.debug: npm run bundle && npm run debugAssemble
scripts.pod:remove: cd ios && rm -rf Pods/ && rm Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
